headline: The Best Vanguard ETF to Invest $1,000 in Right Now
summary: Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) are an excellent way to grow your wealth.  In other words, there are plenty of fantastic Vanguard ETFs to choose from.  In addition, its expense ratio of 0.04% is one of the lowest around.
